<<<<<<< HEAD
[Chrysammoi] Golden sands, or, A few short hints about the riches of grace. Part I begun to be opened from the words of the Apostle, in Eph. 2,7 ... : dedicated to the royal bud of our English hopes, Princesse Elizabeth / by John Bachiler ... Batchiler, John, ca. 1615-1674. Elizabeth, Princess of England, 1635-1650.
[47], 116, [1] p.
Printed by R.W. for Giles Calvert and Henry Overton, London : 1647.
First word of title printed in Greek characters. Errata: p.[1] at end. Imperfect: stained, tightly bound and with print show-through. Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
=======
